question: Some people belive that allowing children to make their own choices on everyday matters is likely to result in a society of individuals who only think about their own wishes.Other people belive that it is important for children to make decisions about matters that affects them,Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: In this modern-day, individual choices have been gaining day by day in the different aspects which affect their  everyday life. Some people claim that it makes their own choice matter likely which people should select Easily, however Another individual believes that it is significant for learning about  different factors.I will discuss  both views and give my opinion at the end.

To commence,there are plenty of choices surrounding  people which make their own wishes on everyday life.If students should  take their own responsibilities own there on the shoulder,therefore,they are able to make independent.Also,people have should solve every problem in their life in different sectors which affect in daily life.They have tried to select their own decision,hence,individuals should make a better future goal in their life.
For instance, in USA -the United States of America, not only children but also adults are learning from their parents how to make independent in their own life and select their  own choice.

On the other hand,there are a plethora of things that affect their daily routine life.Individuals are learning opportunities skills with help of peers or universities because children go to schools or friends houses that time they try to learn something new skills and increase their knowledge.Moreover, children should give respect to their parents and grandparents.For example,a survey was conducted by TOI - Times Of India,it had written in the article,many students are migrating to other countries because they should learn about opportunities and respect.
On concluding note , learners are learning not only food, clothes and entertainment but also they should try to learn about all things which help to make better future in their life.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase however. Consider adding a comma.
Your article usage with the geographic name USA may be incorrect.
